creator: reillyja@sysadm.suny.edu
text:
Could you add a VSS Status search (VSS status command).
This would allow to a search of a VSS project and search for all files checked 
out by all or by named users.

Ex VSS Cmd:
ss Status [VSS items] ....

Tkx,
Jim

If you would like to provide such a task, I'll commit it. 

Work against CVS as the VSS tasks have changed recently.

Jesse
creator: stockall@magma.ca
kevin.jackson@it.fts-vn.com
text:
VSS antlib contains a status task

please see http://people.apache.org/~kevj/ant-vss/ant-vss.html for pre-release
jar, or the ant svn repo for sources (under ant/sandbox/antlibs)
